''Mechos''/''Mechothli'' ([[Gnomish|G]]) | titles= | position= | location=[[Valinor]] | affiliation= | language= | notablefor= | siblings=[[Makar]] | spouse= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons=Spear{{LT1|III}}{{rp|78}} | steed= }} '''Meássë''' was a [[Valar|Vala]] only appearing in the earliest versions of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. She is described as the "warrior [[Gods|goddess]]" and an "[[Wikipedia:Amazons|Amazon]] with bloody arms". She was the "fierce sister" of [[Makar]]. ==History== [[File:A-denn - Measse.jpg|thumb|150px|left|''Measse'' by [[:Category:Images by A-denn|A-denn]]]] Meássë was among the [[Ainur]] who aligned themselves with [[Melko]] during the [[Music of the Ainur]].{{rp|67}} Upon their arrival to [[Valinor]], she and her brother Makar made an abode in the northern [[Aman]], close to the [[Halls of Mandos]].{{rp|79}} She, along with her brother, rode often to the [[Middle-earth|Great Lands]], where they hunted wolves and bears in the black mountains. When the [[Elves]] awoke, and the Valar invited them to live among the Gods, she backed Makar in his opposition to the rest of them, saying that Valinor was built for the Valar only.{{LT1|V}}, p. 117 She joined her brother and the rest of the Valar in the pursuit of Melko and his servants, who were escaping from Valinor after the destruction of the [[Two Trees]].{{LT1|VI}}, pp. 154-155 ==Etymology== '''''Meássë''''' is a [[Qenya]] name, deriving from the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[MEHE]] ("ooze?") and related to the word ''mear'' ("gore"). Its [[Gnomish]] equivalent is '''''Mechos''''' or '''''Mechothli'''''. Among her other names was '''''Rávi''''' (related to ''ravennë'' "she-[[lions|lion]]").,{{LT1|Appendix}}, p. 260 as well as '''''Tarkil''''', deriving from the root [[TARA]] ("to batter, thud, beat").{{PE|14}}, p. 15 ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | |,|-|-|-|.| | |}} {{familytree | MAK | | MEA | |MAK=[[Makar]]|MEA='''MEÁSSË'''}} {{familytree/end}} {{references}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Measse}} [[Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales]] [[Category:Qenya names]] [[Category:Valar]] [[de:Meássë]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/ainur/valar/measse]]
